data.meta_description: As Business Director of ALTIVIA's Specialty Phosgene Derivatives business, John Tharp coordinates commercial activities, maintains key corporate r...
data.text:
As Business Director of ALTIVIA's Specialty Phosgene Derivatives business, John Tharp coordinates commercial activities, maintains key corporate relationships, and identifies strategic opportunities while managing operating income.

Mr. Tharp joined ALTIVIA's commercial team in 2008, where he served as Business Analyst and Marketing Manager for five years. Mr. Tharp has more than 17 years of experience in the chemicals industry. Before joining ALTIVIA, Mr. Tharp was Marketing Manager for Brenntag and worked in the sales and marketing organization for Pioneer Chlor Alkali (Olin).

Mr. Tharp earned a Bachelor of Business Administration in Finance and Computer Information Systems from Baylor University.
